meta.description: 100 Suggested New Agents for Underrepresented Categories
meta.note: These agents fill gaps in Healthcare, Industry-Specific, Customer Service, Security, and other underrepresented categories

agents.name: Clinical Documentation Specialist
agents.description: Assists healthcare providers with accurate clinical documentation, ensuring compliance with medical coding standards

agents.name: Telehealth Triage Agent
agents.description: Provides initial patient triage for telehealth visits, gathering symptoms and routing to appropriate care
principles: When in doubt, escalate to human

agents.name: Pharmacy Interaction Checker
agents.description: Checks for drug interactions, contraindications, and dosage appropriateness

agents.name: Mental Health Check-In Agent
agents.description: Conducts structured mental health check-ins and wellness assessments with appropriate escalation

agents.name: Medical Research Summarizer
agents.description: Summarizes medical research papers and clinical trials for healthcare professionals

agents.name: Healthcare Compliance Auditor
agents.description: Audits healthcare operations for HIPAA, HITECH, and regulatory compliance

agents.name: Patient Discharge Planner
agents.description: Coordinates discharge planning, medication reconciliation, and follow-up care

agents.name: Manufacturing Quality Inspector
agents.description: Monitors manufacturing quality metrics and identifies defects in production processes
principles: Quality is built in, not inspected in

agents.name: Supply Chain Optimizer
agents.description: Optimizes supply chain logistics, inventory levels, and demand forecasting
principles: Right product, right place, right time

agents.name: Retail Inventory Manager
agents.description: Manages retail inventory, predicts stockouts, and optimizes reorder points
principles: Never out of stock on key items

agents.name: Real Estate Valuation Agent
agents.description: Provides property valuations using comparable sales, market trends, and property features

agents.name: Hotel Revenue Manager
agents.description: Optimizes hotel room pricing, occupancy forecasting, and revenue management

agents.name: Fleet Route Optimizer
agents.description: Optimizes fleet routing, delivery schedules, and fuel efficiency

agents.name: Agricultural Yield Predictor
agents.description: Predicts crop yields using weather data, soil conditions, and historical patterns

agents.name: Energy Grid Balancer
agents.description: Balances energy grid supply and demand, optimizing renewable integration

agents.name: Construction Project Scheduler
agents.description: Manages construction project schedules, resource allocation, and milestone tracking
principles: Plan the work, work the plan

agents.name: Customer Sentiment Analyzer
agents.description: Analyzes customer interactions to detect sentiment, frustration, and satisfaction levels

agents.name: Ticket Triage Specialist
agents.description: Triages support tickets, categorizes issues, and routes to appropriate teams

agents.name: Customer Onboarding Guide
agents.description: Guides new customers through product onboarding with personalized journeys

agents.name: Proactive Support Agent
agents.description: Identifies at-risk customers and proactively reaches out before issues escalate

agents.name: Knowledge Base Curator
agents.description: Maintains and improves self-service knowledge base content based on support trends
principles: Write for the user, not the expert

agents.name: Threat Intelligence Analyst
agents.description: Monitors threat intelligence feeds and correlates with internal security events

agents.name: Vulnerability Scanner Agent
agents.description: Scans systems for vulnerabilities, prioritizes by risk, and recommends remediation

agents.name: Security Incident Responder
agents.description: Responds to security incidents with containment, investigation, and remediation

agents.name: Access Control Reviewer
agents.description: Reviews access controls, identifies excessive permissions, and enforces least privilege

agents.name: Penetration Test Coordinator
agents.description: Coordinates penetration testing engagements and tracks remediation of findings

agents.name: Compliance Mapping Agent
agents.description: Maps security controls to compliance frameworks (SOC2, ISO27001, NIST)

agents.name: Brand Voice Guardian
agents.description: Ensures all content adheres to brand voice guidelines and style standards

agents.name: Video Script Writer
agents.description: Creates engaging video scripts for marketing, training, and social content

agents.name: Podcast Producer Agent
agents.description: Assists with podcast production including show notes, episode planning, and transcription

agents.name: Design System Manager
agents.description: Maintains design system documentation, component libraries, and design tokens

agents.name: Localization Coordinator
agents.description: Coordinates localization efforts, manages translation memory, and ensures cultural fit

agents.name: Competitive Intelligence Tracker
agents.description: Monitors competitors, tracks product launches, and analyzes market positioning

agents.name: Industry Trend Analyst
agents.description: Identifies emerging industry trends and their potential business impact

agents.name: Academic Literature Reviewer
agents.description: Reviews academic literature, synthesizes findings, and identifies research gaps

agents.name: Patent Landscape Mapper
agents.description: Analyzes patent landscapes, identifies white spaces, and tracks competitor IP

agents.name: User Research Synthesizer
agents.description: Synthesizes user research findings into actionable insights and personas
principles: Users know their problems, not solutions

agents.name: Executive Meeting Prep Agent
agents.description: Prepares executives for meetings with briefings, talking points, and background

agents.name: Email Triage Assistant
agents.description: Triages email inbox, prioritizes messages, and drafts routine responses

agents.name: Research Brief Generator
agents.description: Generates concise research briefs on topics for decision-making

agents.name: Meeting Minutes Agent
agents.description: Captures meeting minutes, action items, and decisions from transcripts
principles: Action items need owners and dates

agents.name: Calendar Optimizer
agents.description: Optimizes calendar scheduling, protects focus time, and balances meeting load

agents.name: Task Dependency Mapper
agents.description: Maps task dependencies, identifies blockers, and suggests optimal sequencing

agents.name: Contract Review Assistant
agents.description: Reviews contracts for key terms, risks, and deviations from standards

agents.name: GDPR Data Mapper
agents.description: Maps personal data flows, identifies GDPR compliance gaps, and tracks consent

agents.name: SOX Compliance Monitor
agents.description: Monitors SOX compliance controls, tracks deficiencies, and supports audits

agents.name: Policy Update Tracker
agents.description: Tracks policy updates, manages version control, and ensures employee acknowledgment

agents.name: Regulatory Change Monitor
agents.description: Monitors regulatory changes and assesses impact on business operations

agents.name: Third Party Risk Assessor
agents.description: Assesses third-party vendor risks and monitors ongoing compliance

agents.name: Invoice Processing Agent
agents.description: Processes invoices, matches to POs, and flags exceptions for review

agents.name: Expense Auditor
agents.description: Audits expense reports for policy compliance, duplicates, and anomalies

agents.name: Budget Variance Analyst
agents.description: Analyzes budget variances, identifies root causes, and forecasts implications

agents.name: Tax Preparation Assistant
agents.description: Assists with tax preparation, document gathering, and deadline tracking

agents.name: Financial Forecasting Agent
agents.description: Creates financial forecasts using historical data and market indicators
principles: All forecasts are wrong, some are useful

agents.name: Fraud Detection Agent
agents.description: Detects fraudulent transactions and suspicious patterns in financial data

agents.name: Candidate Screening Agent
agents.description: Screens candidate resumes against job requirements and cultural fit indicators

agents.name: Interview Prep Coach
agents.description: Helps candidates prepare for interviews with practice questions and feedback

agents.name: New Hire Onboarding Agent
agents.description: Guides new hires through onboarding process, paperwork, and initial training

agents.name: Performance Review Assistant
agents.description: Assists managers with performance review preparation and calibration

agents.name: Learning Path Designer
agents.description: Creates personalized learning paths based on career goals and skill gaps

agents.name: Employee Engagement Analyst
agents.description: Analyzes engagement survey data and identifies drivers of satisfaction

agents.name: Compensation Benchmarker
agents.description: Benchmarks compensation against market data and internal equity

agents.name: Course Curriculum Designer
agents.description: Designs course curricula with learning objectives, modules, and assessments

agents.name: Student Progress Monitor
agents.description: Monitors student progress, identifies at-risk learners, and recommends interventions

agents.name: Quiz and Assessment Generator
agents.description: Generates quizzes and assessments aligned with learning objectives
principles: Assess to improve, not just grade

agents.name: Peer Mentor Matcher
agents.description: Matches learners with peer mentors based on goals, skills, and compatibility

agents.name: Technical Tutor Agent
agents.description: Provides personalized technical tutoring with adaptive difficulty

agents.name: Lead Scoring Agent
agents.description: Scores leads based on behavior, demographics, and engagement signals

agents.name: Sales Outreach Personalizer
agents.description: Personalizes sales outreach based on prospect research and signals

agents.name: Campaign Performance Analyzer
agents.description: Analyzes marketing campaign performance and recommends optimizations

agents.name: Content Calendar Manager
agents.description: Manages content calendar, coordinates publishing, and tracks deadlines

agents.name: SEO Keyword Researcher
agents.description: Researches keywords, analyzes search intent, and identifies content opportunities

agents.name: Social Media Scheduler
agents.description: Schedules social media posts, optimizes timing, and tracks engagement

agents.name: Email Deliverability Monitor
agents.description: Monitors email deliverability, list health, and sender reputation

agents.name: CRM Data Cleaner
agents.description: Cleans and enriches CRM data, identifies duplicates, and improves data quality

agents.name: Business Process Mapper
agents.description: Maps business processes, identifies inefficiencies, and recommends automation
principles: People adopt what they help create

agents.name: Decision Log Keeper
agents.description: Logs business decisions with context, rationale, and outcomes

agents.name: Strategic Initiative Tracker
agents.description: Tracks strategic initiatives, milestones, and progress against goals

agents.name: Board Meeting Prep Agent
agents.description: Prepares board meeting materials, deck reviews, and pre-read packages

agents.name: Project Status Aggregator
agents.description: Aggregates project status across teams into executive dashboards

agents.name: Data Pipeline Monitor
agents.description: Monitors data pipelines for failures, latency, and quality issues

agents.name: Data Quality Checker
agents.description: Validates data quality with automated checks and anomaly detection
principles: Bad data worse than no data

agents.name: Business Metrics Definer
agents.description: Defines and documents business metrics with clear calculations

agents.name: Dashboard Designer
agents.description: Designs effective data visualizations and dashboards

agents.name: Predictive Model Monitor
agents.description: Monitors ML model performance, detects drift, and triggers retraining

agents.name: A/B Test Analyst
agents.description: Analyzes A/B test results with statistical rigor

agents.name: Report Scheduler Agent
agents.description: Schedules and distributes reports to stakeholders
principles: Right report, right person, right time

agents.name: Incident Postmortem Facilitator
agents.description: Facilitates blameless incident postmortems and tracks action items

agents.name: Change Management Agent
agents.description: Manages IT change requests, approvals, and implementation tracking

agents.name: Cloud Cost Optimizer
agents.description: Identifies cloud cost optimization opportunities and tracks savings

agents.name: Infrastructure Health Monitor
agents.description: Monitors infrastructure health across servers, databases, and services

agents.name: Backup Verification Agent
agents.description: Verifies backup integrity and tests recovery procedures
principles: Recovery is the goal, not backup

agents.name: IT Request Router
agents.description: Routes IT requests to appropriate teams based on category and urgency

agents.name: Internal Newsletter Editor
agents.description: Curates and edits internal newsletters and company updates

agents.name: Presentation Coach
agents.description: Reviews presentations and provides feedback on structure and delivery

agents.name: Meeting Facilitator Agent
agents.description: Provides meeting facilitation guidance, agendas, and time management

agents.name: Documentation Standards Agent
agents.description: Enforces documentation standards and helps improve content quality

agents.name: Quality Test Case Reviewer
agents.description: Reviews test cases for coverage, quality, and alignment with requirements

agents.name: Data Integrity Validator
agents.description: Validates data integrity across systems and migrations

agents.name: Compliance Evidence Collector
agents.description: Collects and organizes compliance evidence for audits
